title: Top Places to visit in Kurung Kumey, Koloriang, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Kurung Kumey district is one of the 22 districts of the northeastern Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh, with its district headquarters in Koloriang.

title: Top Places to visit in Kra Daadi, Jamin, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Kra Daadi is a district in Arunachal Pradesh in north-eastern India. It was carved out of Kurung Kumey district on 7 February 2015.
History
The creation of Kra Daadi district was approved on 21 March 2013 under the Arunachal Pradesh (Re-Organization of Districts) (Amendment) Bill.

title: Top Places to visit in Kamle, Raga, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Kamle district, also Khemle, is the 22nd administrative district (23rd including Itanagar capital complex) of Arunachal Pradesh in northeastern India. Its headquarters is to be located in Raga.

title: Top Places to visit in East Siang, Pasighat, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
East Siang is an administrative district in the state of Arunachal Pradesh in India.

content: East Kameng district is one of the 23 districts of Arunachal Pradesh state in northeastern, India. content: Anjaw District is an administrative district in the state of Arunachal Pradesh in north-east India. title: Top Places to visit in West Godavari, Eluru, Andhra Pradesh
content: West Godavari district or Paschima Godavari Jilla is one of the 13 districts in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The district is situated in Coastal Andhra region of the state. title: Top Places to visit in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh
content: Vizianagaram is a city and district headquarters of Vizianagaram district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and also the mandal headquarters of Vizianagaram mandal.[4] It is located 18 km inland from the Bay of Bengal and 42 km to the northeast of Visakhapatnam.

title: Top Places to visit in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Visakhapatnam is the largest city and the financial capital of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Srikakulam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Srikakulam is a city and the district headquarters of Srikakulam district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
